022import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
023import static org.junit.Assert.assertFalse;
024import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
025
026import javax.servlet.http.Part;
027
028import org.apache.fulcrum.parser.DefaultParameterParser;
029import org.apache.fulcrum.parser.ParameterParser;
030import org.apache.fulcrum.parser.ParserService;
031import org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineServices;
032import org.apache.turbine.test.BaseTestCase;
033import org.apache.turbine.util.ServerData;
034import org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineConfig;
035import org.junit.AfterClass;
036import org.junit.Before;
037import org.junit.BeforeClass;
038import org.junit.Test;
039import org.mockito.Mockito;
040
041/**
042 * Testing of the TurbineURI class
043 *
044 * @author <a href="mailto:quintonm@bellsouth.net">Quinton McCombs</a>
045 * @author <a href="mailto:seade@backstagetech.com.au">Scott Eade</a>
046 * @version $Id$
047 */
048public class TurbineURITest extends BaseTestCase
049{
050    private TurbineURI turi;
051
052    private ParserService parserService;
053
054    private static TurbineConfig tc = null;
055
056
057    @BeforeClass
058    public static void init() {
059        tc =  new TurbineConfig(
060                            ".",
061                            "/conf/test/CompleteTurbineResources.properties");
062        tc.initialize();
063    }
064    /**
065     * Performs any initialization that must happen before each test is run.
066     */
067
068    @Before
069    public void setup()
070    {
071        // Setup configuration
072
073        ServerData sd = new ServerData("www.testserver.com",
074                URIConstants.HTTP_PORT, URIConstants.HTTP, "/servlet/turbine",
075                "/context");
076        turi = new TurbineURI(sd);
077
078        parserService = (ParserService)TurbineServices.getInstance().getService(ParserService.ROLE);
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * Clean up after each test is run.
083     */
084    @AfterClass
085    public static void tearDown()
086    {
087        if (tc != null)
088        {
089            tc.dispose();
090        }
091
092    }
093
094    @Test public void testAddRemove()
095    {
096
097        assertFalse("TurbineURI should not have a pathInfo", turi.hasPathInfo());
098        assertFalse("TurbineURI must not have a queryData", turi.hasQueryData());
099        turi.addPathInfo("test", "x");
100        assertTrue("TurbineURI must have a pathInfo", turi.hasPathInfo());
101        assertFalse("TurbineURI must not have a queryData", turi.hasQueryData());
102        turi.removePathInfo("test");
103        assertFalse("TurbineURI must not have a pathInfo", turi.hasPathInfo());
104        assertFalse("TurbineURI must not have a queryData", turi.hasQueryData());
105
106        turi.addQueryData("test", "x");
107        assertTrue("TurbineURI must have a queryData", turi.hasQueryData());
108        assertFalse("TurbineURI must not have a pathInfo", turi.hasPathInfo());
109        turi.removeQueryData("test");
110        assertFalse("TurbineURI must not have a queryData", turi.hasQueryData());
111        assertFalse("TurbineURI must not have a pathInfo", turi.hasPathInfo());
112    }
113
114    @Test public void testEmptyAndNullQueryData()
115    {
116        // Check empty String
117        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
118        turi.addQueryData("test", "");
119        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine?test=", turi.getRelativeLink());
120        turi.removeQueryData("test");
121
122        // Check null
123        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
124        turi.addQueryData("test", null);
125        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine?test=null", turi
126                .getRelativeLink());
127        turi.removeQueryData("test");
128        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
129    }
130
131    @Test public void testEmptyAndNullPathInfo()
132    {
133        // Check empty String
134        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
135        turi.addPathInfo("test", "");
136        // Kind of susspect result - might result in "//" in the URL.
137        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine/test/", turi.getRelativeLink());
138        turi.removePathInfo("test");
139
140        // Check null
141        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
142        turi.addPathInfo("test", null);
143        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine/test/null", turi
144                .getRelativeLink());
145        turi.removePathInfo("test");
146        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
147    }
148
149    @Test public void testAddEmptyParameterParser()
150    {
151        ParameterParser pp = new DefaultParameterParser();
152        turi.add(1, pp); // 1 = query data
153        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
154    }
155
156    @Test public void testAddParameterParser() throws InstantiationException
157    {
158        ParameterParser pp = parserService.getParser(DefaultParameterParser.class);
159        pp.add("test", "");
160        turi.add(1, pp); // 1 = query data
161        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine?test=", turi.getRelativeLink());
162        turi.removeQueryData("test");
163        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
164
165        parserService.putParser(pp);
166        pp = parserService.getParser(DefaultParameterParser.class);
167        pp.add("test", "null");
168//        pp.add("test", (String) null); // isnotnull guarded
169        turi.add(1, pp); // 1 = query data
170        // Should make the following work so as to be consistent with directly
171        // added values.
172        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine?test=null",
173        turi.getRelativeLink());
174
175        turi.removeQueryData("test");
176        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
177
178        parserService.putParser(pp);
179        pp = parserService.getParser(DefaultParameterParser.class);
180        pp.add("test", "1");
181        pp.add("test", "2");
182        turi.add(1, pp); // 1 = query data
183        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine?test=1&test=2", turi.getRelativeLink());
184        turi.removeQueryData("test");
185        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
186
187        parserService.putParser(pp);
188        pp = parserService.getParser(DefaultParameterParser.class);
189        Part part = Mockito.mock(Part.class);
190        pp.add("upload-field", part);
191        turi.add(1, pp); // 1 = query data
192        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine?upload-field=", turi.getRelativeLink());
193        turi.removeQueryData("upload-field");
194        assertEquals("/context/servlet/turbine", turi.getRelativeLink());
195    }
196
197}
